M

main(String[]) - Static method in class edu.sharif.librarymanagementsystem.Main
Main method that runs the program
Main - Class in edu.sharif.librarymanagementsystem
It is the main class of the program It runs main menu and allows librarian and members to login
Main() - Constructor for class edu.sharif.librarymanagementsystem.Main
 
Member - Class in edu.sharif.librarymanagementsystem.member
Member class represents Members of the library In fact Members are defined as a class to model the real world Members with oop design model As Members in the real world they have a name, a username and a national code To avoid complexity other features of a real member are not used in our modeling The members also have a state that shows if they are logged in the current situation or not Note: It is a subclass of User class
Member(String, String, Integer) - Constructor for class edu.sharif.librarymanagementsystem.member.Member
Constructor of the Member class that makes a member
MemberController - Class in edu.sharif.librarymanagementsystem.member
It is the main class that controls member accessibility to the system It is possible to logout and return to the main menu
MemberController() - Constructor for class edu.sharif.librarymanagementsystem.member.MemberController
 
memberInfo - Static variable in class edu.sharif.librarymanagementsystem.Storage
This stores username and full name of members to make the search process easier
memberLogin(MouseEvent) - Method in class edu.sharif.librarymanagementsystem.Main
It lets the member login the system
MemberMenuController - Class in edu.sharif.librarymanagementsystem.librarian
It controls member menu By this we can open add member menu We can delete a member It also shows all members in the system to the librarian
MemberMenuController() - Constructor for class edu.sharif.librarymanagementsystem.librarian.MemberMenuController
 
members - Static variable in class edu.sharif.librarymanagementsystem.Storage
An array that stores members of the system
MyBooksMenuController - Class in edu.sharif.librarymanagementsystem.member
This class controls the MyBooksMenu of a member It makes it possible to see the list of borrowed books and return them if the member wants
MyBooksMenuController() - Constructor for class edu.sharif.librarymanagementsystem.member.MyBooksMenuController
